prompts.prompt: I have a 50-page PDF report and I only need pages 10-15. How can I extract just those pages into a separate file?
Can you help me extract all the text from this PDF so I can copy it into a Word document?
I need to merge three different PDF contracts into one file for my client. They're called contract1.pdf, contract2.pdf, and contract3.pdf
There's a data table in this PDF financial report that I need to analyze in Excel. How can I get that table data out?
I scanned some old documents but they're saved as PDFs and I can't select the text. Is there a way to convert the text so it's searchable?
I want to create a professional-looking PDF invoice from scratch with my company logo, customer details, and an itemized table. Can you show me how?
Some pages in my PDF presentation are sideways and I need to rotate them to be right-side up before I send it to my boss
I have a PDF with multiple data tables spread across different pages, and I need to extract all of them and combine them into a single Excel spreadsheet for analysis
My company wants to add a watermark to all our PDF documents for branding purposes. I have about 100 PDFs that need this watermark applied
I need to create a password-protected PDF that contains sensitive financial data, but I also want to extract some metadata from an existing PDF to see who created it and when
